channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
ok i have java 6 update 7 and i have my system varibles class path= C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; and for my path i have C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin these are all in user varibles and the code for my compiler is @echo off Title Chases awesome compiler @echo off echo Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\ echo Compilling Done! pause
somebody please tell me wat im doing wrong

@echo off
Title Chases awesome compiler
@echo off

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
echo Compilling Done!
pause

somebody please tell me wat im doing wrong[/quote]

well see this part with the arrow

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @1_0wn3d_U_I 1 0wn3d U I
item.description:
@1_0wn3d_U_I wrote:

I have an awesome Compiler here you can try, works on every source I have =]

@echo off
title Credits To Gezza
color 08
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo [FastVersion] Thank You for using Gezza's compiler!
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Compiling... Please Wait...
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
echo You do not have any JDK/Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Source has been compiled...
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo If you have 1 or more errors, you need to fix those to compile correctly!
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
pause
exit
  • G . ε . Z . z . @ -

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @D00msd D00msd@y
item.description:
@D00msd wrote:

here this one is alot eaiser cause i just had the same prob with it but i fixed

and put these in you environmentals

Class path

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

path

.;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @catthoor catthoor
item.description:
@catthoor wrote:

[quote=“Black-Murder, post:1, topic:227915”]ok i have java 6 update 7 and i have my system varibles class path= C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; and for my path i have C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin these are all in user varibles and the code for my compiler is
@echo off
Title Chases awesome compiler
@echo off
echo Compiling…
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
echo Compilling Done!
pause

somebody please tell me wat im doing wrong[/quote]

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
This 1 will work =)
And btw, its bether you use your example in a code thing =)

Read full topic
